question: Analyze the social media engagement metrics of companies in the technology industry.

subtasks.task: Retrieve company names and details for companies classified under the technology industry from the CompanyInfo table.
Collect Facebook engagement metrics (likes, comments) for each company in the technology industry from the CompanyFacebookDetail table.
Gather Instagram engagement metrics (likes, comments) for each technology company from the CompanyInstagramDetail table.
Compile Twitter engagement metrics (likes, retweets) for the technology companies using the CompanyTwitterDetail table.
Consolidate all social media metrics (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter) to provide a comparative analysis of social engagement for the technology sector.
